segments.text: How much are you asking for this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm offering them to you at 150 yuan a piece . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is tax already included in their price ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Our price can't be matched .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you consider a volume discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you buy 1,000 or more , you'll get a 10 % discount .
segments.speaker: S2
